page_content: The page provides information on agricultural buildings, including required documents and regulations for construction in agricultural zones.
The page provides comprehensive information on children and youth homes, including regulations, financing, and supervision.
The page discusses taxation regulations for various types of companies, including holding, domicile, and mixed companies.
The page discusses the impact of climate change on mobility and logistics, focusing on reducing greenhouse gas emissions.
The page outlines regulations and procedures for construction in forests and near forest edges, including required permits and legal frameworks.
The page provides details on the repeal of a directive concerning the collection of property transfer taxes by the Land Registry Office.
The page provides extensive information on civil protection operations and community support, including guidelines, documents, and equipment details.
